Name: IngredientRole
Title: Ingredient Role
Descriptino: A classification of the ingredient identifying its purpose within the product.

Name: ProductClassification
Title: Product Classification
Descriptino: This value set includes codes from the Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical Classification System - provided as an exemplar value set.

Name: SNOMEDCTSubstanceCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Substance Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all substance codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

Name: UnitOfPresentation
Title: Unit Of Presentation
Descriptino: The presentation type in which an administrable medicinal product is given to a patient.
